question:
You would like a job working in a summer camp which runs sports and outdoor activities for children and young people.

Write a letter to the organiser of the summer camp. In your letter:

describe your personality
say what relevant experience and skills you have
explain what sort of work you would like to do.
text: I am writing this missive to express my interest in working at the summer camp that is organised by you that especially focuses on the fitness of the adolescents.

Let me elaborate on my certain qualities.I am a fitness freak person.Besides, I am a certified trainer in the REX gym which has  branches all over the world.Furthermore,I could continuously work  outdoor for long hours as I have a strong immune system.

During the last summer vacation,I had done my internship in Pap Public School and there I was involved in enormous activities like aerobics,dancing e.t.c.I have gathered an experience of 4 months in this relevant skill.

I will be grateful if you would allow teaching the students about some sort of physical fitness exercises such as indispensable dance forms.Moreover,in case of any further information,please feel free to contact me.
Hope to hear from you soon
